description: "Food Tech" is a hotspot in Silicon Valley right now. So of course, if you're hungry, there's an app for that. Plus, we talk about Xbox's debut in China with Molly Wood, technology columnist for the New York Times.
title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, September 29, 2014
teaser: "Food Tech" is a hotspot in Silicon Valley right now. So of course, if you're hungry, there's an app for that. Plus, we talk about Xbox's debut in China with Molly Wood, technology columnist for the New York Times.
